welcome_message_body: Welcome to Guangzhou, China! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich history, delicious Cantonese cuisine, and vibrant cultural scene. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Guangzhou has to offer.

restaurants.name: Tiger Prawn Vietnamese Restaurant (大头虾越式风味餐厅 Tiger Prawn Vietnamese Restaurant)
restaurants.description: Tiger Prawn Vietnamese Restaurant (大头虾越式风味餐厅 Tiger Prawn Vietnamese Restaurant) is a vietnamese restaurant located in 广州.
restaurants.address: 惠福东路548号, 广州, 广东

restaurants.name: 点都德大茶楼
restaurants.description: 点都德大茶楼 is a dim sum restaurant located in 广州.
restaurants.address: 越秀区惠福东路470号(富临食府对面), 广州, 广东

restaurants.name: Hai Di Lao Hot Pot 海底捞火锅 (海底捞火锅)
restaurants.description: Hai Di Lao Hot Pot 海底捞火锅 (海底捞火锅) is a hotpot restaurant located in 广州.
restaurants.address: 广州市海珠区新港中路354号珠影。星光城123，206号铺, 广州, 广东

restaurants.name: Saba Restaurant (沙巴餐厅)
restaurants.description: Saba Restaurant (沙巴餐厅) is a middle eastern restaurant located in 广州.
restaurants.address: 环市中路300号 (天秀大厦C座1楼沙巴餐厅), 广州, 广东, 510050

restaurants.name: Dayang Stewed Soup (達楊原味燉品 Dayang Stewed Soup)
restaurants.description: Dayang Stewed Soup (達楊原味燉品 Dayang Stewed Soup) is a soup spot located in 广州.
restaurants.address: 文明路160號-1 (At Beijing Rd.), 广州, 广东

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal of Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal of Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
